description:
Bryan and Kris Uhl are one of Kentwood Cherry Creek's Premier Real Estate Teams. The Uhls specialize in the Denver metro area but have sold properties all over Colorado, including the suburbs and foothills. Their success is a direct result from their principal goal – customer satisfaction.

Kris started her real estate career in 1995 and Bryan was soon to follow in 1997. Bryan and Kris each have a BS in Marketing and several years of sales experience, which not only enables them to provide creative and unique ways of marketing properties, but lends valuable managing and negotiating techniques to all aspects of complex real estate transactions.

Colorado has been home to the Uhls since 1993. Bryan and Kris are parents to two lovely children, Aidan, 17, and Addison, 13. As a family, they love the outdoors. They enjoy snowboarding/skiing, hiking, traveling, and playing tennis together. While their family is a clear priority for the Uhls, they are also dedicated to providing their clients with only the best Real Estate services.

Buying and/or selling a home is an enormous task, and often times the biggest purchase one makes in their lifetime. Bryan and Kris have made it their mission to make the buying/selling process as simple and enjoyable as possible. Please feel free to give them a call to discuss your options. They are always willing to provide a free market analysis of your home or a complete buyer package with a list of services.
title: Broker Associates, Realtors ®

description:
JIM BUCKLEY

Buying or selling a home is one of life’s biggest decisions, and with 40 years of experience, Jim ensures it’s a seamless and rewarding journey. His deep market knowledge, honest advice, and expert negotiation skills help buyers find the perfect home and sellers maximize their property’s value. Jim’s calm and professional approach eliminates stress, making the process smooth from start to finish. If you want a Realtor who knows Denver inside and out and is committed to your success, Jim is your guy.


DAN BUCKLEY

Dan is dedicated to making real estate simple, strategic, and stress-free. He takes the time to understand his clients’ needs, providing clear guidance and a tailored approach to buying or selling. With strong market expertise and negotiation skills, Dan helps sellers showcase their homes for top value and assists buyers in securing the right property with confidence. When he’s not working with clients, he enjoys skiing, golfing, and exploring Colorado with his wife, Eden, and their two dogs.


HELENA BUCKLEY

Helena plays a key role in delivering exceptional client experiences as part of the Buckley Team. She assists buyers in finding the perfect home while working closely with sellers to stage and present their properties for maximum appeal. As a certified stager, she ensures homes stand out in the market and attract the right buyers. Her attention to detail, warmth, and dedication make every step of the process smooth and successful.
title: Broker Associates, Realtors ®

description:
Carly (aka Caroline) is a seasoned real estate professional specializing in helping investors and first time buyers. With years of experience helping investors acquire rental properties, fix-and-flips, pop-tops, and scrapes, she has developed a keen ability to identify high-potential opportunities that maximize returns. Carly’s deep understanding of market trends, property valuation, and strategic investment planning makes her an invaluable partner for clients looking to build and expand their real estate portfolios.

Before joining Kentwood Real Estate, Carly launched her sales career with Windermere Real Estate in Denver. Her journey in real estate began in 2013 with property management, providing her with a strong foundation in the industry. She earned her real estate license in 2015 and has since been dedicated to delivering exceptional service to buyers, sellers, and investors alike.

Carly holds a degree in Interior Design from the Art Institute of Philadelphia, a background that allows her to help clients visualize a property’s full potential. Whether guiding a family to their ideal home, assisting clients in relocating, downsizing, or making strategic investment decisions, Carly combines her design expertise with market knowledge to create a seamless and stress-free experience.

Her passion for real estate began early—purchasing her first home at just 19 years old. Experiencing the home-buying process firsthand at a young age gave her unique insight into the challenges and rewards of real estate ownership. Today, she leverages that experience to educate and empower first-time homebuyers, ensuring they make informed decisions that align with their long-term goals.

Originally from Pennsylvania, Carly fell in love with Colorado while serving with AmeriCorps National Civilian Community Corps in Denver from 2010 through 2012. After traveling around the Southwest for various community service projects, she knew Colorado was where she wanted to build her future.

When she’s not assisting clients, Carly enjoys traveling, camping, and hiking throughout Colorado. Carly currently resides in University Hills.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Carolyn’s clients will tell you that she loves her business and that paid off for them! Whether it is looking for a new property with a first-time buyer  or putting together a strategic marketing and sales plan for a multi-million dollar listing, Carolyn is focused, energetic and thorough. 

With an extensive professional background in sales and negotiating, along with marketing and advertising, Carolyn combines that expertise with the leading-edge technology and electronic tools of The Kentwood Company. She believes that outstanding customer service, use of technology, and creative marketing are critical to achieving a successful transaction for her clients. She is consistently a top producer and  is a member of the Denver Board of Realtors Million Dollar Roundtable.

Carolyn works with both Buyers and Sellers. She regularly handles Estate and investment properties, cooperating closely with financial institutions, lawyers, trustees and family members.  She has long-standing relationships with people in a variety of professions throughout the metro area that are valuable resources to her business and her clients. 

Ongoing volunteer work is a reflection of her commitment to an enriched life in our community, Carolyn has been involved with The Junior League of Denver, Warren Village, Winter Park Competition Center and Ski Education Foundation, History Colorado, Central City Opera House Association Guild/ L’Esprit Home Tour, Denver Debutante Ball, and the PTSAs for Steck Elementary School, Hill Middle School, East High School, and George Washington High School.

Carolyn has lived in Denver for over 30 years and is married to a 5th-generation native, Bruce. They have twin sons who are enjoying the young adult lifestyle in Colorado as well.  She and her family really make the most of our Colorado lifestyle – skiing, sailing, hiking, tennis, pickleball, and participating in a variety of activities around town.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
You may know something about me, you may know nothing. Here's a short intro on me and I look forward to getting to know YOU, what you love and what is important to YOU! 



Meet Caryn: Proud mom of two energetic boys, a loving wife, outdoor enthusiast and dedicated Realtor.

Caryn has 13 years of experience in Real Estate both locally and internationally, she is passionate about helping people and developing authentic connections built on transparency and trust. Caryn is known for her honesty, deep knowledge, and unwavering integrity. She is in constant communication with her clients as they go through the process, and she continually goes above and beyond the realtor call of duty. Caryn has a tenacious work ethics as both a homeowner, income property owner and realtor which makes her empathetic to clients as they experience the current real estate climate. 

Whether you're buying or selling, she’ll always have your best interests at heart, guiding you through the process with a personal touch and a smile!

My personal motto: Do more of what YOU love!

Here to help!
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Charlotte lives by the mantra that first impressions are everything. Before getting her real estate license, Charlotte honed her design eye as a buyer in women’s contemporary and designer clothing. She built a loyal clientele with her strong sense of fashion and the desire to make everyone look and feel like the best version of themselves. Since relocating to Denver, she helped numerous clients transform their wardrobes and closets. She has translated that love of aesthetics to real estate. She is able to see potential in almost every home she enters whether it’s a fixer upper or a new build that needs your personal stamp. She loves staging homes by bringing in furniture, art, and accessories to ensure your home feels unique, modern, and stylish. She uses her past experience in some of the best closets in Denver to help edit and organize your home before you list. Small details matter, and she wants your home to shine the minute it hits the market.

Charlotte attended Tulane University in New Orleans where her love of historic architecture and design was cemented. She has a particular affinity for homes with a bit of a past. Her clients value her attention to detail and no-nonsense east coast sensibility. She will always tell you what you need to hear rather than what you want to hear. The process of buying a home (whether it’s your first or last) can be confusing and stressful, and she aims to walk you through every step of the way with a little bit of humor thrown in for good measure.

Charlotte jokes that she is probably the least Colorado person in all of Denver. She has never skied in her life and has zero desire to ever hike a 14-er. She will work 24-7 if you let her, but when she takes that rare time off, she loves playing tennis, entertaining friends with a fabulous dinner party, and cheering for all the Washington, DC sports teams even when they’re terrible.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
As a seasoned entrepreneur with over 20 years of experience in building and scaling businesses across a variety of industries, I bring a wealth of knowledge and a unique perspective to the real estate world. Having successfully founded, grown, and exited several businesses, I understand the value of strategic planning, negotiation, and delivering results—skills that are crucial in helping clients achieve their real estate goals. 

My journey into real estate has been shaped by my background in business development, financial management, and operations. I started my career by launching an environmental health and safety consulting business that was successfully exited after 12 years of continuous growth. This was followed by launching a service-based business that was developed from the ground up, growing it into a multi-location operation with over 70 employees. After years of driving its growth and overseeing every aspect of the business, I successfully facilitated its acquisition, marking a significant milestone in my career. These experiences taught me the importance of understanding both the big picture and the fine details—qualities that I now apply to every real estate transaction. 

Whether it’s assisting first-time homebuyers, investors, or those looking to sell, I leverage my strong negotiation skills, financial expertise, and deep understanding of market dynamics to guide clients through the process. My ability to build relationships and create value through strategic partnerships has proven invaluable in the real estate market, where every deal is an opportunity to create lasting connections and deliver exceptional results. 

In addition to my business acumen, I have extensive experience in risk management and regulatory compliance. This ensures that every transaction I manage is smooth, transparent, and legally sound, giving my clients peace of mind. I’m also committed to providing a personalized experience—listening to my clients’ needs, understanding their goals, and offering guidance at every step of the way. 

Beyond my professional life, I’ve been deeply involved in my community. As president of the Spartans Youth Club, I’ve led organizational growth and mentored young athletes. I’ve also spent years coaching youth football, focusing on skill development, teamwork, and leadership. These experiences have shaped my approach to real estate, where I emphasize collaboration and open communication, ensuring that my clients feel supported throughout the process. 

When I’m not helping clients find their dream properties, you can find me enjoying the outdoors, whether it’s golfing, snowboarding, or scuba diving. Traveling is another passion of mine, as it gives me the opportunity to learn and explore new perspectives. 

Whether you're buying, selling, or simply exploring your real estate options, I’m here to provide the expertise, commitment, and personalized service you deserve. Let’s work together to make your real estate goals a reality!
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Christie Lysaught is known for her hard work and dedication, and has been a top producing broker since embarking on her real estate career. As a Denver native, she has an intimate knowledge of the Denver Metro area and has spent time throughout her life up and down the front range. Christie’s passion for design, architecture, culture, and the local scene all aligned perfectly to position her as a top notch real estate advisor. 

Christie graduated from Colorado State University with a BA in Communications. Post College, Christie spent a decade working in Corporate Sales for various professional sports teams, most notably for the New York Yankees. Following her stint in sports, she also worked as a consultant in Manhattan where she was responsible for providing strategic sales and marketing insights to several notable Fortune 500 companies c-level executives. Christie’s formal education along with high-level sales, marketing and negotiation roles have perfectly positioned her to serve her clients real estate needs. 

Christie’s approach is to be instrumental in curating the life that her clients have always dreamed of as their lifelong real estate advisor. Her goal is to facilitate the journey so that the process is as straightforward, understandable, and enjoyable as possible. She aims to provide the highest level of service, professionalism and peace of mind when working with her clients. She always goes above and beyond for clients and as a credentialed GRI- Graduate Realtor Institute®, Pricing Strategy Advisor®, Certified Negotiation Expert, and Realtor®. 

In her spare time, she enjoys immersing herself in the community. Some of her favorite activities include skiing and snowboarding, hiking, paddle boarding, and yoga. When not working, Christie spends time with her husband, son, daughter and goldendoodle enjoying all that Colorado has to offer.

 
Kelly Tierney is a Colorado native and her pride for this state is apparent! Kelly and her family have stayed in the Denver metro area after graduating from the University of Denver with a degree in International Business and Real Estate and knows you’d love this city too if you saw it as she does. Licensed to sell real estate for over 15 years now, Kelly has seen the landscape and the makeup of the residents change dramatically and offers insights to her clients that only a local can know.

Kelly is a Realtor® with a skilled knowledge of the Front Range and uses this expertise to create a custom experience for her clients when buying or selling real estate. Kelly works with buyers, sellers, builders, and venture capitalists to make sound investments and navigate some of life’s biggest changes. Kelly also specializes in relocation and helping clients moving neighborhoods, cities or even states when your professional life requires you to make a move. Educating new Colorado residents on all the special ways Denver is remarkable is one of the perks of her job! Kelly knows that this quick-moving market can be demanding, moving homes can be taxing, and you need reliable advice. She also understands the intricacies of balancing work and life better than most.
Kelly is a loving wife and mom of three amazing kids, a runner, a part-time yoga instructor, and makes this work all on top of being a high performing broker. It's a lot to juggle, but she wouldn’t have it any other way. Not sure where to start? Kelly would be honored to help. For a no-pressure meet-up with Kelly over coffee or phone chat to put your mind at ease, reach out today via text, phone call, or email.
title: Realtors®, BPOR, CNE, SRS

description:
COUNT ON CHRIS TO MAKE YOUR REAL ESTATE GOALS - REAL!!  

Chris has been working with people and homes in the Denver Metro Area since childhood.  

Experience gained in his family's home design and remodeling business made Chris naturally talented as a Realtor - enhancing his ability to work well with people and understand their goals.  He provides a unique and creative, individualized approach to his client's needs - always with their best interests in mind.

As a Dad of two grown children, Chris has experienced nearly all of the issues and excitement that motivates his clients in their Real Estate decisions and can personally relate to the importance of the Knowledgeable, Experienced, Caring Services of a Professional.

Community involvement includes selection as a Guest Speaker for the Colorado Association of Realtor's "Education Foundation" benefiting students from CU, DU and CSU; various Leadership Positions with the South Metro Denver Realtor Association; and participation in Focus Groups with area Builders and Developers seeking Chris' input and expertise.

Chris specializes in the marketing, sale and purchase of new and resale Homes, Townhomes and Investment Properties throughout the Denver Metropolitan and Mountain Front Range areas.  

Chris enjoys being a Realtor, and consistently obtains Top Results for his Buyers & Sellers!!

But in his spare time ... Chris enjoys Hiking & Biking while exploring Beautiful Colorado, plus quick getways to Exotic International Beaches for Scuba Diving!!
title: Broker Associate ABR,CRS

description:
Chris Howey is the Managing Broker, at Kentwood Real Estate DTC and is a seasoned and highly respected Realtor® in Colorado with a reputation for delivering exceptional results. Since becoming licensed in 2009, he has built a thriving career specializing in metro Denver’s premier neighborhoods, known for his strategic expertise, attention to detail, and client-first approach.

In his role as founder of The GHS Group, Chris has helped shape one of Colorado’s most successful real estate teams. With over 50 years of combined experience and more than $750 million in total sales, The GHS Group brings a collaborative and resource-driven mindset to every transaction. Their shared goal: to provide a superior real estate experience and help more people achieve their goals.

Whether you're relocating, upgrading, or investing, Chris’s in-depth knowledge of Denver’s market and proven marketing strategies ensure a seamless process from start to finish. Clients trust him not only for his professionalism and results, but for his ability to make the experience both smooth and rewarding.

From the first meeting to closing and beyond, Chris remains a dedicated advisor and advocate—earning the loyalty of repeat clients and countless referrals.

Partnering with Chris Howey means working with a leader in luxury real estate who is committed to excellence at every level.
title: Managing Broker, Broker Associate, Realtor ®

description:
Chuck is a seasoned real estate professional who truly believes his value to his clients has to be earned every day and knows his reputation is only as good as his last client’s experience.

“My commitment to my clients’ needs and welfare is all that lasts when the job is finished.  All my years of experience, training and success don’t mean anything until my clients know they can trust me and I won’t ever let them down.  I am committed to never taking my clients’ sacred bond of trust for granted.  This philosophy of business has been the backbone of my success and my greatest source of pride in my career.”

Chuck specializes in Denver’s higher-end residential neighborhoods.  His business has been almost exclusively referral and repeat clients for many years.

Chuck’s Resume Summary:
Recognized as the #1 Cherry Hills Village Agent.

Recognized as the #1 Agent for All Kentwood Real Estate Offices.

35 years of brokerage experience in the Denver real estate market.

Recipient of 5280 Magazine's 5-Star Realtor award for the many consecutive years.

Average annual real estate sales of over $40 million.

Annually ranked one of the top realtors in the Denver Metro area by The Denver Board of Realtors.

Ranked in the top 1% of Colorado residential listing agents.

Prior to his residential career, Chuck Gargotto was Vice President of a commercial investment real estate brokerage firm and Director of Real Estate of a national shopping center development company.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor ®

description:
I was born and raised through the formative years on the South Side of Chicago very near The Illinois Institute of Technology! I can remember as a child wandering through the iconic campus designed by one of my favorite architects, Meis van de Rohe! I developed, at an early age, a special appreciation for the buildings and those that created the amazing architecture that surrounded me!

I studied ballet from the age of 4 which led me to study dance at Butler University (Indianapolis), Mills College (Oakland), Cornish College of Arts (Seattle) and then on to New York City to study with and perform with numerous dance companies, most notably "The Dance Theater of Harlem." I currently enjoy being a member of the board of a fabulous local theater company, "The Catamounts."

Travel has been a constant during my lifetime, and I have been fortunate to visit many countries and several continents including a year of study in West Africa and several months in Southeast Asia!

In 1992 I moved to Boulder from the NYC area with my family including two young children in tow. Bear Creek Elementary, Southern Hills Middle School, Horizons Middle School, Fairview High School, New Vista High School, CSU, and CU. I am so proud to have raised my children here in the beautiful city of Boulder.

I started my Real Estate Career in Boulder in 1993 and have since been privileged to successfully help hundreds of clients obtain the home of their dreams or realize the most gain on their home investments. I am honored by the loyalty and friendship of so many clients over the years!

Year after year, I have earned the Berkshire Hathaway President’s Circle Award given to those who are in the top producing 3% of Agents. In 2021 I was honored to receive the Berkshire Hathaway Chairman’s Gold Award given to those who are in the top producing 2% of Agents and most recently, I was honored to receive the Berkshire Hathaway Chairman’s Platinum Award given to those who are in the top producing 1% of Agents.

And now here I am, grandmother of three darling children and still going strong. I adore my profession as a realtor and continue to learn and to expand on my expertise.

As a proud member of Kentwood Real Estate Boulder Valley, I am extremely excited to offer my services to you in order for you to realize your Real Estate dreams!
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Since moving to Denver in 2016, Connor has gained ample experience in Denver’s commercial real estate market. Specializing in landlord representation, tenant/occupier services and investment sales, Conner leverages his background to create custom real estate solutions for all of his clients that include: leasing, subleasing, renewals, relocation, consolidation & expansion, and build-to-suit opportunities. Connor’s holistic approach not only satisfies the short-term needs of his clients, but also anticipates and achieves their long-term objectives making him a trusted strategic business advisor and resource.  

Prior to joining Kentwood Commercial, Connor was a leasing and sales specialist with NAI Shames Makovsky and Coldwell Banker Commercial Advisors, focusing his efforts in Denver’s Central Business District (CBD) and downtown periphery.

Connor graduated from the University of Colorado with a bachelor’s degree in communications and advertising. A Montana native, he is an avid fly-fisherman, enjoys skiing and golf and taking advantage of both the bustling Denver scene and the tranquility of the mountains. 

Relevant transactions:

Tenant & Landlord representation completing over 390,000sf in leasing and sales assignments totaling over $70,000,000 in transaction value. Relevant transactions include:

·         VF Corporation

·         US Department of Veteran Affairs

·         Urology Center of Colorado

·         CoreSite

·         Cannon Design

Experience:

2022-Present: Broker, Kentwood Commercial, Denver, CO

2017-2022: Broker, NAI Shames Makovsky, Denver, CO

2016-2017: Broker, Coldwell Banker Commercial Advisors, Denver, CO

Affiliations

·         EO Colorado

·         National Federal Developers Association (NFDA)
title: Senior Commercial Advisor

description:
Cryer Team’s Mission:  Provide Real Estate Services so complete, thorough and professional, The Team becomes not only YOUR real estate resource, but by referral the resource for your family, friends and associates.  Inherent in this mission statement is the vision of impeccable service and unquestionable integrity.
 
Dee and Tom provide a multi-disciplined background of experience, service and results in the Denver residential market.
 
The Team is dedicated to providing SELLERS an unparalleled marketing strategy, superior Internet presence, exceptional customer service and consistent communication backed by more than 30 years of successful residential experience.
 
The Team is also dedicated to providing BUYERS an organized, strategic and aggressively negotiated platform from which to acquire the home of their needs and dreams.  They have worked diligently to provide a list of concierge services making the buying process transparent and supportive.
 
Tom and Dee have been awarded and acknowledged by their clients, peers and associates many times throughout their careers.  That being said, they are most proud of what their past clients have written about them in the form of testimonials.
 
We would urge you to take an hour, come visit our office, discuss your needs and wants with us and learn why our system may work best for you.
title: Broker Associates, Realtors®, SCRP

description: Dan is dedicated to making real estate simple, strategic, and stress-free. He takes the time to understand his clients’ needs, providing clear guidance and a tailored approach to buying or selling. With strong market expertise and negotiation skills, Dan helps sellers showcase their homes for top value and assists buyers in securing the right property with confidence. When he’s not working with clients, he enjoys skiing, golfing, and exploring Colorado with his wife, Eden, and their two dogs.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Danielle is a Colorado native born and raised in Loveland, CO. She has been married for 13 years to her husband Justin and has 3 children. Danielle and Justin have built a residential construction company that has been thriving in Northern Colorado for the past 14 years. After building one successful company Danielle decided to follow her passion for Real Estate by becoming an agent in 2014.

After taking a short break to spend time with her 3rd baby Danielle is excited to have joined the Kentwood family to begin focusing again on how to help serve clients with all of their real estate needs.

Danielle believes that the best part about real estate is building relationships with people. “Many people think about real estate as a transaction based business, but I see it as a relationship based business...my main priority is building relationships and focusing on how to be helpful and a source of information for my clients.”

Danielle also loves to have fun and enjoys all the wonderful things that Northern Colorado has to offer... whether it be a craft beer on a patio, golf with friends, or a hike with family.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor ®

description: David Morrison has 35 years of commercial experience in Denver with Oxford Ansco, Brookfield Properties, CBRE, Grubb & Ellis, and Colliers International. He has leased over 3M sqft of office space and 500 lease transactions and has done over $100M of sales volume.
title: Kentwood Real Estate Services

description:
With more than 30 years of experience, over $66m in closed sales in 2024 and a longtime resident of Denver, Dawn has established herself as one of the area's top producing luxury brokers. Providing unparalleled service to all her clients whether buying or selling their homes. 

Raymond is the go-to broker for many of the area's most dynamic Developers, representing numerous iconic custom home and condominium developments including; NorthCreek, 250 Columbine, Laurel, Belcara, Belcourt and The Estates at Cedar Ave. as well as many of Denver's finest resale residences.

For new construction projects, Dawn is involved in the design and sales process from conception through closing, providing her expertise and market knowledge from the floor plan design, selection of finishes and the most captivating way to present a residence to the market. Dawn's exceptional experience and true understanding of what buyers are looking for in the market allows her to be the best advocate for all of her clients.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor ®

description:
Matthew McNeill hails from a background in residential development and offers a rich and unique perspective to home buying.

Matthew has a vast appreciation for Colorado's natural beauty from the peaks of the Rocky Mountains to Denver's most esteemed, charming and eclectic neighborhoods. He is also philanthropically involved with many local and national organizations; additionally, Matthew is an avid traveler and adventurer but also enjoys spending time with his family, friends and neighbors at his home in Belcaro.

Matthew obtained his degree in Real Estate and Construction Management from the University of Denver and has integrated that knowledge with 11 years of hands on experience. Through his high-energy and attention to detail, coupled with his understanding and practice of the industry, Matthew has procured over $100 million dollars in home sales ; he is sought after for his know-how and knowledge by builders, developers and home-buyers/sellers alike.

Kevin Garrett was born and raised in Denver Colorado, and as a Colorado native, has a great appreciation for the diversity and history of this amazing city.

Kevin attended the University of Colorado as an engineering student, has owned several successful entrepreneurial businesses, enjoys the outdoors, international travel, and currently resides in the Belcaro neighborhood. Seventeen years ago Kevin found his passion for Real Estate. He discovered a phenomenon in which he was able to combine his enthusiasm for design, outstanding attention to detail, drive and dedication, with his knowledge and love of Denver.

Kevin offers these talents to the benefit of all his clients- whether they home-buyers, investors or developers. He has implemented the success of several well known projects throughout Denver, including: Lodo, Cherry Creek, Golden Triangle. Kevin has proven to be of invaluable service from inception to completion- specializing in pricing and creative marketing and, of course, sales.

Kevin has been a member of the Denver Board of Realtors since 1990 and has served on the Ethics Committee since 1994, and Chairman since 1997 and is well known throughout this industry for his incredible talent of bringing people and properties together.
title: Broker Associates, Realtors®

description:
Dee Chirafisi – Broker/Founder
providing over 25 years of expert real estate service

As a full time professional broker of Kentwood City Properties, I provide the expertise and energy it takes for successful real estate transactions in any real estate market!

The World belongs to the energetic…Emerson

 What makes me successful:
· Committed to service, results and professional ethics.
· Incredible referral network with hundreds of satisfied clients.
· Expansive network of brokers throughout Colorado and the entire US and beyond.
· A Denver real estate expert in market trends, neighborhoods, and properties. I stay ahead of the technology curve and market trends. Staying one step ahead of the competition.

As a result of my commitment and hard work and thanks to all of my loyal clients, I have consistently closed over 30 million in sales per year for the past decade, even in the most difficult markets. This consistently ranks me in the top 10 brokers by the Denver Board of Realtors. I believe that seeing consistent results is the best way to show a broker's value and strength in this market!

I approach Real Estate as a full time profession:
Not only do I work as a broker representing buyers, sellers and developers. I am also one of the founders and managers of Kentwood City Properties a leading residential brokerage with cutting edge technology.  I have extensive knowledge selling all types of properties: single family homes, town homes, condos, lofts, land and mixed use properties. I sell all over the Denver area and I refer clients to other regions through Kentwood’s relocation network.

Personal facts:
I have lived in Central Denver for over 30 years. I enjoy running with my dogs, seeing great films, soaking up art and music, traveling and of course architecture and real estate! I am involved in many civic ventures: I have served on the Lower Downtown Design Review Board, I served as a  chairperson for the Denver Housing Council Marketing Committee, I currently serve on the Denver Civic Ventures Board and I am a member of the Downtown Denver Partnership, Lower Downtown District Inc, the Botanical Gardens, and Museum of Contemporary Art. I am passionate about giving my time and energy back to this great city!!! I have also been nominated for Outstanding Business Woman of the Year by the Denver Business Journal.

Full Service:
I am able to provide full service to all of my clients with the invaluable help of my full time licensed assistant Becky Sable. Becky and I have worked together for over 17 years. She is the behind the scenes detail person that enables me to personally work with clients, negotiate transactions and develop relationships and business. Every successful broker needs a right hand administrative assistant and Becky is the best in the business!   

Working for Sellers/Buyers:
Both buyers and sellers benefit from my extensive market knowledge, huge network of clients, and strong negotiation skills.  With an innovative approach to marketing and problem solving, challenges are easily met.

 I would love to work for you and help you with your real estate needs. There are three easy ways to reach me:
deec@kentwoodcity.com 
• cell: 303-881-6312  • office: 303-785-3512
title: Broker Associate/Founder

description:
There's a reason why I am known as "Downtown Dena". Few people know Downtown Denver real estate better than myself. A fourteen-year resident of Downtown Denver, my knowledge of the Downtown Denver real estate market and my enthusiasm for the city's offerings are unmatched. Whether it is the redevelopment of Union Station, rezoning in LoHi, or a new restaurant in LoDo, nothing gets past me. This intimate knowledge of Downtown Denver and the adjacent city-close neighborhoods is why sellers and buyers seek me out for their real estate needs.

NEW PROJECTS EXPERT
I was one of the first residents of the vibrant Riverfront Park neighborhood, the award-winning multi-use development along Commons Park below Union Station. There, I worked for the neighborhood developer, East West Partners, selling real estate in one of Denver's most sought after neighborhoods. After my first year in sales, I was awarded the Silver Rookie of the Year Award by the Colorado Home Builders Association. Since that time, I have succeed as a top producer in Riverfront Park, participating in over Five Hundred Million in new development sales from 2000 to 2010.

EXPERIENCE & EXPERTISE
In 2011, I expanded my scope to include all Central Denver neighborhoods, becoming one of Denver's top producers, participating in approximately Fifty million in real estate sales.

LIVING THE LIFESTYLE
Originally from Houston, Texas, I earned my bachelor's degree from the University of Houston where I graduated magna cum laude. I moved to Colorado in 1991, where I lived and worked in the luxury mountain community of the Vail Valley. My professional accomplishments include ownership of my own health and fitness business, producer of a nationally syndicated television series, on-air television personality, and status as a top producing, 14-year broker in Downtown Denver real estate. I am active with several charitable and cultural organizations including the Denver Art Museum, Project Angel Heart, the Denver Rescue Mission, CultureHaus, and the Museum of Contemporary Art. When I'm not selling real estate, I enjoys skiing, theatre, music, and the arts- and of course, living and working in Downtown Denver.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
With a multifaceted career that spans sales, event planning, radio hosting and insurance, Diana Godina brings a wealth of experience and a unique skill set to the real estate industry. Her journey began in sales, where she honed her ability to build relationships, understand client needs, and close deals effectively. This foundation has been invaluable in her real estate career, enabling her to navigate complex transactions with ease. Her event planning background adds another layer of expertise, as she adeptly organizes open houses, client meetings and networking events, ensuring seamless and memorable experiences.

Transitioning from radio hosting to real estate, Diana has developed exceptional communication skills, engaging with diverse audiences and mastering the art of marketing and promotion. These abilities are crucial in real estate, where effective communication can make or break a deal. Additionally, her experience as an insurance agent has given her a thorough understanding of the legal and financial intricacies involved in real estate transactions, ensuring that her clients are well-informed and protected throughout the process.

Driven by the desire to make a meaningful impact, Diana chose a career in real estate to help individuals and families find their dream homes and navigate significant life transitions. She is passionate about building long-lasting relationships with her clients, guiding them through the complexities of the market, and helping them achieve their goals.

Joining Kentwood Real Estate was a natural choice for Diana as the company's commitment to excellence, integrity, and professionalism align perfectly with her own values. The collaborative and supportive culture at Kentwood provides the ideal environment for her to thrive and continue growing. Her success as a REALTOR® is fueled by a client-focused approach, continuous self-education, and a strong commitment to ethics and integrity. Her bilingual proficiency enables her to serve a diverse clientele effectively.

Outside of her professional life, Diana is deeply connected to her community. She co-founded Rayito de Luz/Beam of Light, a non-profit organization dedicated to promoting the mental health of the elderly through innovative communication strategies and engaging activities. Originally from Chihuahua, Mexico, she has lived in the Aspen - Rifle Valley and moved to Denver in 2018. She loves dancing, exploring Cherry Creek's culinary and shopping gems and cherishing her time with her family. Diana’s philosophy of prioritizing clients' needs and staying true to herself ensuring that she provides genuine and exceptional service to all her clients.

SPANISH 

Diana Godina tiene una carrera multifacética que abarca ventas, planificación de eventos, conducción de radio y seguros, aportando una gran experiencia y un conjunto único de habilidades a la industria inmobiliaria. Su trayectoria comenzó en ventas, donde perfeccionó su habilidad para construir relaciones, entender las necesidades de los clientes y cerrar acuerdos de manera efectiva. Esta base ha sido invaluable en su carrera inmobiliaria, permitiéndole navegar transacciones complejas con facilidad. Su experiencia en planificación de eventos añade otra capa de experiencia, organizando con destreza jornadas de puertas abiertas (Open House), reuniones con clientes y eventos de networking, asegurando experiencias fluidas y memorables.

Al pasar de la conducción de radio al sector inmobiliario, Diana ha desarrollado habilidades excepcionales de comunicación, interactuando con diversos públicos y dominando el arte del marketing y la promoción. Estas habilidades son cruciales en el sector inmobiliario, donde la comunicación efectiva puede hacer o deshacer un trato. Además, su experiencia como agente de seguros le ha proporcionado un entendimiento profundo de las complejidades legales y financieras involucradas en las transacciones inmobiliarias, asegurando que sus clientes estén bien informados y protegidos durante todo el proceso.

Impulsada por el deseo de hacer un impacto significativo, Diana eligió una carrera en bienes raíces para ayudar a individuos y familias a encontrar sus hogares soñados y navegar transiciones importantes en la vida. Le apasiona construir relaciones duraderas con sus clientes, guiándolos a través de las complejidades del mercado y ayudándolos a alcanzar sus metas.

Unirse a Kentwood Real Estate fue una elección natural para Diana, ya que la compañía está comprometida con la excelencia, la integridad y el profesionalismo, valores que coinciden perfectamente con los suyos. La cultura colaborativa y de apoyo en Kentwood proporciona el ambiente ideal para que ella prospere y continúe creciendo. Su éxito como REALTOR® se basa en un enfoque centrado en el cliente, la educación continua y un firme compromiso con la ética y la integridad. Su habilidad bilingüe le permite atender efectivamente a una clientela diversa.

Fuera de su vida profesional, Diana está profundamente conectada con su comunidad. Es cofundadora de Rayito de Luz/Beam of Light, una organización sin fines de lucro dedicada a promover la salud mental de las personas mayores a través de estrategias innovadoras de comunicación y actividades atractivas. Originaria de Chihuahua, México, ha vivido en el valle de Aspen-Rifle y se mudó a Denver en 2018. Le encanta bailar, explorar los tesoros culinarios y de compras de Cherry Creek y disfrutar de su tiempo con su familia. La filosofía de Diana de priorizar las necesidades de los clientes y mantenerse fiel a sí misma asegurándose en brindar un servicio genuino y excepcional a todos sus clientes.

description:
Dierk Herbermann is Chief Operating Officer and Employing Broker at Kentwood Real Estate. Kentwood serves communities along the front range Denver metropolitan area to Fort Collins and northern Colorado and operates residential and commercial brokerage, leasing and property management, and a subsidiary mortgage company, Prosperity Home Mortgage. Kentwood Real Estate is an affiliate of HomeServices of America.

Dierk’s vast experience leading real estate brokerages as General Manager and Counsel in the San Francisco Bay area and most recently in Denver for LIV Sotheby’s,  prior to joining Kentwood Real Estate, provide the growing executive team an opportunity to expand their focus on business development opportunities and strategy, while remaining solidly mindful of their highly successful brokers and brand. “I’m thrilled to be returning to a local brand with a Leading RE and Luxury Portfolio Connection,” says Dierk. “It’s where I feel most at home in brokerage, and where the customer is always best served.”

While in San Francisco, Dierk played a role on a collaborative management team at Paragon Real Estate Group in their becoming the #1 brokerage in San Francisco in 2017. A management team operated much like Kentwood’s. Prior to moving into real estate management, Dierk was a top sales agent.  An experience which today provides him the empathy to understand the day to day life of an agent/broker and has helped him successfully build offices and companies.
title: COO and Employing Broker

description:
Living in Denver continuously since 1960, Dotson has witnessed The Mile High City mature to become one of the nation’s top metropolitan statistical areas.  As one of Denver’s elite real estate salesman with 2,150+ homes sold and $750,000,000+ in sold volume, Dotson is annually one of the top 15 agents out of 5,000+ members with the Denver Metro Association of Realtors.

Based on the principles of service, professionalism, and our Realtor Code of Ethics, Dotson sponsors and donates his time to numerous community service projects such as dumpster day, shredding day, a community garage sale weekend and a neighborhood young entrepreneur’s career fair.  Dotson also distributes American flags to neighborhoods for the Fourth of July, helps sponsor a neighborhood picnic, prepares and distributes HOA directories to various communities and sponsors a neighborhood annual photo session with the Easter Bunny.  Dotson also serves his fellow Realtors by volunteering on the Denver Metro Association of Realtor’s Professional Standard’s (Ethics) Committee.

To better serve his clientele with the principles outlined above, Dotson left his own independent real estate company after 22 successful years and joined the nationally acclaimed Kentwood Real Estate in 2005.  Dotson has been blessed with the opportunity to serve countless homeowners and buyers with their individually unique and diverse needs.

In addition to real estate, Dotson’s passions are spending time with his growing family, working out, playing golf, reading and observing the political scene.  He dreams to one day possess a golf game which is commensurate to his real estate career.  However, Dotson is also known to be overly optimistic when it comes to his golf game.

Dotson’s Favorite Quote:  “Never Give Up.  Never Give up.  Never.  Never.  Never.”  Sir Winston Churchill (1941)

In addition to possessing a true love for assisting homeowners and buyers with their real estate needs, Dotson is just as devoted to his family's needs. In his leisure time, Dotson enjoys activities such as snow skiing, golfing and camping in the beautiful Colorado mountains.  Dotson has also contributed to the Denver Metro area community by being an active supporter in many local groups and charities. title: Broker Associate, Emeritus Status

description:
Elizabeth Hotz – Luxury Homes Broker | Denver Native | Trusted Real Estate Advisor

 
"My real estate goal is to be competent, energetic, trustworthy, and successful at completing the sale or purchase of your major asset—your home!"
— Elizabeth Hotz
 

A licensed Broker and Realtor since 2005, Elizabeth Hotz brings a wealth of local knowledge, marketing expertise, and genuine care to every client relationship. Recognized annually by the Denver Metro Association of Realtors and The Kentwood Real Estate Million Dollar Club for outstanding residential sales, Elizabeth has earned a reputation for excellence in Colorado real estate.

Elizabeth is part of The Hotz Group, a top-producing team at Kentwood Real Estate’s DTC office, which she runs alongside her father and longtime Denver Realtor, Larry Hotz, and her sister, Meredith Hotz. Together, they bring decades of combined experience and a collaborative, family-oriented approach to buying and selling homes.

Whether it’s luxury estates, investment properties, urban condos, or family homes, Elizabeth’s portfolio spans all property types across Denver and its suburbs. Her deep roots in Cherry Hills Village, professional background in marketing and public relations, and personal experience living in both Southern Hills and Downtown Denver give her unique insight into the city’s diverse neighborhoods and lifestyles.

For luxury sellers, Elizabeth provides international exposure through Luxury Portfolio Magazine, delivering world-class marketing for high-end properties. For buyers, especially those relocating, she’s committed to matching people with the right home in the right community—something she does with diligence, intuition, and care.

Beyond real estate, Elizabeth is an active member of the Pi Beta Phi Alumnae Association, a past board member of the Fine Arts Foundation, and a proud supporter of organizations like the Anti-Defamation League, Families First, and the National Kidney Foundation. She also serves her business community through the Denver Metro Chamber of Commerce.

Outside of work, Elizabeth enjoys spending time with her two sons, Wyatt Bjorn and Thatcher, updating their family home in Southern Hills, exploring new restaurants, and taking in the best of Denver’s events and culture.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
After spending her formative years between Milwaukee and France, Elizabeth headed west to attend Colorado College.  She immediately fell in love with Colorado’s abundant opportunities for outdoor adventure.  Elizabeth began her career in real estate in 2009 and was thrilled to join Kentwood Real Estate in 2011.  She cites Kentwood’s strong reputation, ethics and culture of collaboration as just some of the reasons she chose to be a Kentwood broker.   

Between 2012-2020, Elizabeth and her team won 5280 Magazine’s Five-Star Real Estate agent award every year, consistently ranking among Kentwood Cherry Creek’s top 3 producers in both volume and number of transactions closed.  Elizabeth has received multiple certifications as a Realtor, including as a Pricing Strategy Advisor.  In 2021, Elizabeth partnered with Libby Levinson to create Vesta Homes at Kentwood Real Estate, with the shared vision of offering clients a level of service, experience and market knowledge rarely combined in the real estate industry.

Whether a client is purchasing their dream home or an investment, downsizing or expanding, Elizabeth is an expert strategist, trusted advocate and seasoned negotiator.  Drawing on a diverse background in fundraising and academia, Elizabeth excels at managing the process of purchasing and selling property so that her clients are aware of every opportunity available.  She works tirelessly to ensure her clients realize the greatest return and satisfaction from their experience.  Elizabeth breaks the transaction down into clear steps, explaining each process, so her clients are knowledgeable and empowered about their decisions throughout the contract.  She maintains strong relationships with her clients, checking in and consulting as they consider improvements or next steps.

In her own words, “I focus on the potential my clients have to maximize their home appreciation and am always examining properties to ensure their growth over time.  Having seen the highs and lows of various real estate markets, I work to protect my clients’ long term real estate interests.  Finding value and opportunity in housing is what drives me.  I’m proud to say that 100% of my clients are referrals from past clients, and I often work with multiple generations of families.”  Having painstakingly remodeled an 1895 Victorian home, she provides her clients thoughtful insights into profitable upgrades and the nuances of the inspection process.  Her expertise spans the Denver metropolitan area and its wide range of neighborhoods, price points, and school districts.  

When not working, Elizabeth spends time with her husband and two daughters enjoying Colorado’s rivers and mountains, voraciously reading her next book club selection, or traveling the globe- from Antarctica to Zanzibar.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®, PSA

description:
Eric Fitch is an accomplished real estate professional with Kentwood Real Estate. Eric's clients rely on his cutting edge sales and marketing expertise, as well as his white glove customer service.

Eric Fitch is serving the diverse real estate needs of home buyers and sellers throughout the greater Denver area; including the Front Range cities of Morrison, Evergreen, Idaho Springs, Littleton, Lakewood and other regional cities.

Eric Fitch earned his real estate license in 2004 and is a member of the Denver Metro Association of Realtors, the Colorado Association of Realtors and the National Association of Realtors. He has been a member of the 15-plus Million Dollar Club, and is a recipient of the Innovation Award and the People's Choice Award. Eric Fitch attended Fort Lewis College and started his real estate career immediately thereafter.

Eric Fitch aligned with Kentwood Real Estate because of its impeccable reputation, superior marketing department and the depth and breadth of experience and knowledge of the company's Brokers.

Eric Fitch has built a successful rental property portfolio, has renovated high-end historic properties and served as a volunteer fire fighter. He is an active supporter of The Children's Hospital, Project Angel Heart, The Colorado Coalition for the Homeless and the Scientific and Cultural Facilities District. Eric Fitch enjoys hiking, biking, skiing, fishing and Colorado's majestic Rocky Mountains. He also enjoys traveling, science, biology, technology and entrepreneurship.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Meet Fielding – Your Denver Real Estate Insider

Fielding is Denver through and through. Born and raised in Congress Park, she’s a proud graduate of East High School and now calls Harvey Park home. Aside from a five-year adventure in Oregon, where she earned a degree in Art History from the University of Oregon, Fielding has always been rooted in the Mile High City.

Her lifelong connection to Denver gives her an unmatched insider’s perspective on the city’s neighborhoods, from beloved local staples to up-and-coming hotspots and hidden gems only a true local would know. She also comes from a real estate legacy: her mother, Aimee Twarogowski, is a longtime Denver Realtor, giving Fielding both a personal and professional foundation in the business. With deep roots and a pulse on Denver’s ever-evolving housing market, she offers clients a strategic edge when it comes to buying or selling.

Combining her love for art, architecture, and interior design with her deep market knowledge, Fielding brings a creative eye and thoughtful approach to every transaction. She has a unique ability to see the beauty and potential in every property, whether it shines from the curb or reveals itself slowly.

When she’s not helping clients find their perfect place in Denver and the surrounding areas, you’ll likely find Fielding spending time with her partner and two daughters, knitting something cozy, thrifting for vintage treasures, gardening, or diving into her latest home project. She and her family live in a mid-century modern Cliff May home, where she continues to enjoy the charm of Denver living and the strong sense of community she’s always cherished.

Whether you’re new to Denver or a longtime local, Fielding is ready to help you find a home that feels just right.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
With his no-excuse attitude and infectiously positive demeanor, Foodie draws on 15+ years of experience to get the job done, helping his clients achieve their goals and dreams.

Raised in Greenwood Village, Foodie grew up in the real estate world and the Cherry Creek School system. He likes to say that the neighborhoods he “plays” in today are the same as those he did back in the day. “My vast knowledge and network of relationships benefit my clients. I lead them through every aspect of a transaction and set expectations upfront. After working together, we usually end up friends.” 

For the last seven years, Foodie was with a national builder. From development to design, from excavation to delivering finished homes, he was consistently recognized as one of the company’s top customer service and salespeople. This commitment to providing first-class service, integrity and innovation next led Foodie to Kentwood. “I wanted to be part of something special.” They understand the secret to building long term relationships is earning the trust, respect and loyalty of every single client. 

Having lived in Southern California, traveled extensively in France and holding an active license in the Greater Las Vegas Area, Foodie points to the importance of local, national and international collaboration to bring buyers and sellers together.

Foodie has made a point of mentoring and training new sales and broker associates at every stage of his and their careers. What advice does he dispense? “Be optimistic, brave, have faith and always strive to be better tomorrow than you are today. And invest in real estate!” 

He passionately supports charities addressing the significant needs of domestic animals. A ski bum through and through, he is proud to be both a skier and snowboarder. “If it involves a ski lift and goggles, I’m there. Having the mountains and lakes in our backyards never gets old.” 

Foodie’s colleagues call him a caring, generous, hard-working guy, something he credits his parents with instilling in him. “They showed me not to take shortcuts, to lead by example and to always treat others the way I wanted to be treated.”
title: Broker Associate, Realtor ®

description: Unparalleled Service With Outstanding Results Is What YOU Can Expect From Us!!! Gayle has excelled in the residential real estate market for the past 51 years and Tiffany for the past 7.5. They have been ranked as top producers in their company and are continually members of the Million Dollar Roundtable. In 2015, they were ranked among the top 5 teams in Kentwood Company Cherry Creek for production. This is our full time career and we love our work! We are available to our clients 24 hours a Day, 7 days a week. We are outstanding listeners to our clients’ wants and needs and know the real estate market remarkably well. We excel in matching our clients to properties, negotiating throughout the transaction and obtaining phenomenal results! We specialize not only in the Denver neighborhoods such as Cherry Creek, Highlands, Wash Park, Platte Park, Congress Park, Hilltop, LoDo, Bonnie Brae and Country Club, but also out south in Cherry Hills Village, Greenwood Village and Littleton. Wherever you want to go, we are here to help you get there! We are committed to providing our clients with the highest degree of service a realtor can provide from the first meeting through the closing and beyond. We have received many accolades from other realtors as well as past and present clients and are always delighted to share the many letters we have received with our perspective new clients. We are here for the most important move of all.....YOURS!!!
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Are you ready to embark on your journey to homeownership? Look no further – I'm here to help make your real estate dreams a reality!

With over two decades of experience in the dynamic world of real estate, I've worn many hats – from helping individuals like you buy and sell homes to guiding investments in properties, arranging mortgages, and overseeing home development projects. Your passion for finding the right home and achieving your real estate goals is my driving force.

What sets me apart? I'm not just a realtor; I'm also a seasoned mortgage lender. This dual expertise gives you a unique advantage, allowing you to navigate both sides of the transaction with confidence. You deserve the best deal possible, and I know the ins and outs, the hurdles, and the shortcuts to get you there.

Your schedule is my priority. I'm available seven days a week, and I'll gladly work around your evenings to accommodate your needs. Communication is key, and I promise to keep the lines open and transparent throughout the entire process.

Whether you're a first-time buyer stepping into the world of homeownership or a seasoned pro looking for your forever home, I'm here to simplify the process for you. My goal is to see you wear a smile of satisfaction throughout your journey, from the first showing to the final closing.

Let's turn your homeownership dreams into reality together. Reach out to me today, and let's get started on your path to the perfect home.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description: #1 Brokers at Kentwood Real Estate for over a decade, with over $1 billion in sales over the last 2 decades. A dynamic mother-daughter team, Gina and Kara offer a unique real estate experience, blending exceptional concierge-level service with intimate market knowledge. With over 4 decades of combined real estate background, Gina and Kara are distinguished by honesty and integrity, developing relationships with an art and finesse of listening and understanding a client’s needs. Through connecting buyers and sellers to achieve their real estate goals, Gina and Kara successfully navigate a wide spectrum of complex transactions, accomplishing the best results for every client, regardless of market and price point.
title: Broker Associates, Realtors®

description:
The ultimate Denverite, Greg grew up in Glenmoor, attended St Mary's and Kent Denver and learned to play golf at Cherry Hills. His father instilled in him at an early age that hard work, reliability, and communication are key to achieving the goals you set in life and business. “My dad is the most focused, honorable and caring person I know. He taught me that we learn more from our struggles than from our successes and that I always have to be raising the bar for what clients should expect from me.”

Greg left the nest to study Theater and the Entertainment Industry at Rollins College in Winter Park, FL, and then worked on numerous international projects, commercials, and Netflix productions. Having scratched the show biz itch Greg was drawn to real estate and in 2016 began his 2nd career as an agent in West Palm Beach, Fl. He set out to deliver relaxed and enjoyable experiences for his clients. Even with business booming, he could feel the mountains calling and returned home, immediately drawn to the brand he grew up seeing in the city’s nicest neighborhoods.

 “I knew about Kentwood’s incredible reputation as the best place to build a wonderful career in Colorado. The brokers are impeccable and set the standard for expertise and ethical business practices.” Between his insight into the nuances of different communities and the resources Kentwood provides him, the results have been undeniable. He also enjoys working with FHA and VA buyers. “Those transactions can be tricky but it’s so fulfilling helping a buyer accomplish more than they ever imagined.”

Greg also loves getting to share his favorite spots with relocation clients. A perfect Saturday starts with helping a client close on their dream home and then heading over to City Park to explore the Denver Zoo, Science Museum or IMAX theater, followed by a nutritious lunch at Mustard's Last Stand and Bonnie Brae Ice Cream. “I only indulge a couple of times a year, so I live vicariously through my clients, many of whom become friends.” Greg is passionate about the Denver Dumb Friend's League and Habitat for Humanity. Whenever he can, he escapes to the mountains for fly fishing, hiking, skiing and nature photography.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
If you are a new client, past client, friend or have been referred to Greg, you have selected a truly dedicated professional.  My promise to you is this: If you are a buyer, I will work with you for as long as it takes not to just find a house, but rather a home you love.   As a seller I will customize a marketing plan that will sell your homes as quickly and as smoothly as possible.

I approach each transaction uniquely.  If you’re a “First Time” buyer, if you need “More Room”, or you want to “Move Downtown”; Kentwood Real Estate's inventory can help fill these needs with some of the best homes in the area.  If you are an Executive, I can find your weekend loft or prestigious estates.  If you are a Real Estate Investor I can find your rental properties, commercial tenants or help in the purchase and sale of “fix and sell” properties.

Born and raised in the Denver area, Greg went to Cherry Creek High School and was an International Affairs/Japanese Major from the University of Colorado, Boulder.  Greg also received a Degree from the California Culinary Academy (Culinary Arts/ Hospitality Management).  His past experiences in the restaurant/ hospitality industry (as owner/operator and general manager in some of Denver’s finest establishments) helped him develop the ability to control stressful situations with ease.

Greg is also the organizer for the Denver Pug Club, and involved in charitable organizations including Habitat for Humanity, the Sakura Foundation and Share Our Strength.  Greg is also on the Kentwood DEI counsel and helps support many community events.

Together with Allison Smookler, Zach Gilbert and Ron Smookler we are theMOVEgroup of Kentwood Real Estate!  Visit us as theMOVEgroupCO.com
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
I am a Broker Associate with the Kentwood Cherry Creek office.  Even though I am proudly born and raised in Iowa, my family has always had strong ties to Colorado.  This brought me to the University of Denver for my BSBA degrees in Finance and Marketing, and I also obtained my MBA.  After graduating I became a Landman, and I bought and sold oil and gas properties.  This background in title research and negotiations gives me a unique perspective on creating efficient transitions.  Real estate has always been a passion of mine, and runs in my blood, as I am honored to be a third-generation real estate agent.  I pride myself on my tenacity during the transaction process and an intense attention to detail.  I cannot wait to make your next home buying or selling experience a success!

Outside of real estate, my husband and I are raising two young kids!.  We love spending time with our neighbors, doing home renovations and getting up to the mountains as much as possible.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®, MBA

description:
When we think of classic, we think of nature's beauty, the time-tested, a model of excellence. We think of memorable sunsets, a bouquet of roses, the finest cars, beautiful homes. Things that make us feel good about life and all it has to offer.

J. Garland Thurman understands. He maintains a classic approach to work and play founded in a strong commitment to the values of family life. He grew up in a small town in the Ozark Mountains (population 500) where his family owned a farm. Garland has fond memories of milking cows after school and taking care of all kinds of livestock including Hereford cattle, horses, chickens and hogs. To this day, he retains a small town charm from an upbringing that taught him to treat others with respect and honesty.

After graduating from the University of Missouri with a degree in marketing, he was offered a position with a large oil firm. Soon he was promoted and transferred to Denver to handle the company's real estate concerns. This position opened up new horizons to Garland, and he saw how his talents and expertise were perfectly suited to creating real estate solutions.

He also experienced firsthand the challenges that accompany a job transfer. Garland is one of Denver's foremost experts in corporate relocation who has developed a plan that benefits the employer and helps make the transition for the employee and his or her family as comfortable as possible. "Whether it's a corporate relocation or a local resident who wants to buy or sell a home, I guide them in the analysis of what home or sales strategy best suits their needs," says Garland. "My greatest professional reward comes from helping families achieve their real estate goals." When you talk with Garland, you find that he really cares about people and is committed to being the best in his profession. This is evident from his classic approach to real estate. Very few agents have achieved his level of production or caliber of service. As you talk with him, you're overcome by his enthusiasm and calmed by his knowledge.

Garland is a no-nonsense, straight-forward businessman who understands the good old-fashioned values of customer service. Most importantly, he knows real estate is a people business, that the bottom line is your satisfaction. Buying or selling a home is often the largest transaction most of us will make in our lifetime. That's why Garland strives to keep your transaction simple and worry free. "My number one priority is to provide exceptional service," he says. "I think the real estate process should be an enjoyable experience." Call Garland today and experience his classic approach to real estate... because your family deserves it.

description:
It’s no exaggeration to say that Jaden was destined to be a broker at Kentwood considering her dad, Keith, has been with the brokerage for more than three decades. “I was selling girl scout cookies during sales meetings when I was six-years-old.” Little did she know that one day she’d be Keith’s business partner and participating in those same meetings now as a colleague. “I have never worked with a kinder, more community-minded company than Kentwood, and for that, I am incredibly grateful.”

This Park Hill Native is as Colorado as Colorado gets. After graduating from East High School, she earned her degree in English and Creative Writing from Colorado College. Besides a few years in Oregon working in retail management and as a non-profit Grant Writer and Communications Manager, she has spent her entire life here in the mountains.

Jaden points to her focus on relationship building as the foundation for her success. She reminisces about attending open houses and meeting new clients with her dad. “His sincerity and empathy in helping clients make such an intimidating financial decision inspired me. That’s why I specialize in working with first-time home buyers now. I strive to be the approachable Realtor® who meets clients where they’re at. I want them to know no matter where in the process they are, no matter what their price range, no matter the depth of their experience with real estate, I am there for them.”

Having earned her Realtor® designation, Jaden is also a proud member of the Denver Metro Association of REALTORS®. “It is a great organization that keeps me current in all aspects of the business.”

A former staff member and current volunteer, she is deeply committed to the mission of the CASA (Court Appointed Special Advocates) organization, working with children in the foster care system, identifying gaps in care and advocating on their behalf in court. She’s also passionate about mental health and social justice advocacy.

Jaden’s nine-pound dog, Bear, is the Combs Sell Homes’ team mascot. She has a dark green thumb (Kentwood green of course) and she’s using the other nine fingers to bang out her first novel, usually roosting at St. Mark’s Coffee House. The way to her heart starts and ends with their chocolate chip cookies.

description:
There are so many great places to live in Northern Colorado!  Whether you're buying or selling, I'm here to guide you through the process.  If you're selling, let's discuss how to showcase your home for the best possible price. If you're buying, let's explore your lifestyle & needs and find the perfect home to match.  I'll be with you every step of the way, through all the steps of the journey. 

With over a decade of experience, I've helped countless clients achieve their real estate goals. I offer expert guidance, strong negotiation skills, and deep market knowledge to every buying, selling, or investment transaction. My commitment to exceptional service extends far beyond closing—I'm always just a call, text, or email away.

If you're interested in new construction, that is one of my specialties. In 2014 I worked to obtain a Certified New Home Specialist (CNHS) designation. I am well equipped to guide you through the new home process, whether you are interested in a community developed by one of the big guys (DR Horton, Century, Toll Brothers, etc) or in a completely custom home built by a Northern Colorado builder.

I am honored to serve as President-Elect of the Fort Collins Board of Realtors and as a member of the NoCo HBA. I am passionate about advocating for our industry and championing the rights of homeownership. One of the greatest aspects of being a Realtor is the incredible support and continuous educational opportunities offered by our local, state, and national organizations. In our ever-changing field, continuous learning is essential for success. 

Thanks for dropping by my page and I look forward to hearing from you.    

5 things about me:

Favorite Colorado outdoor activity:  Do I have to pick just one?  Ok, road biking… no wait, paddleboarding… no wait, hiking.

Favorite place to travel:  Just about any beach location or Italy.

Favorite sports team:  KC Chiefs, don’t judge… I lived there for 10 years in the 90’s during the Schottenheimer heyday.

Past Life:  I ran away with the circus (as the Lighting Director, not the bearded lady) and was a lighting designer & electrician for hundreds of shows and events across the country.

Favorite place to volunteer:  Meals on Wheels.

description:
As a proud member of Leading Real Estate Companies of the World, Janet’s vast network of over 150,000 top-tier professionals spans all 50 states and more than 40 countries.  Recognized as a Top Producer, she is multi-licensed in California and Colorado.  Located in the Montecito Branch, Janet specializes in both the purchase and sale of single-family residences and estates in Montecito, Santa Barbara, ranch/vacant land, and oceanfront residences along the Rincon Coastline. Located in Colorado is Kentwood Real Estate Boulder Valley serving the greater Boulder, Front Range and Denver areas in the purchase and sale of single-family residences and ranch land.

Janet has had a diverse and successful entrepreneurial career in sales spanning more than three decades combining her vast experience and professional knowledge. She spent 18 years as a para-legal with a focus on contracts in real estate, corporations, medical malpractice, litigation, and the entertainment industry.  She served as the COO of a start-up software development company in San Francisco for two years. She created and operated a bakery café that grew to seven locations originating the proprietary recipes, hiring, training, trademarks, marketing, and lease negotiations.

Establishing her real estate career in 1999 in Los Angeles, in Santa Barbara in 2004, and in Boulder in 2022, Janet offers marketing opportunities that include exposure through her networking services through both brokerages, international connections and vast personal global network of agents.  Her overall objective is to ensure that clients meet their personal real estate goals creating a win/win scenario for all involved.

On a professional level in California, Janet is a member of the Santa Barbara Association of Realtors and served on its Board of Directors 2014-2019, 2021-2022; Vice President of the Board of Realtors 2017 & 2019, Education Committee 2007-2021, Budget & Finance Committee 2017 & 2019, the MLS Committee 2016-2023, Professional Standards & Ethics Committee 2014-2023, the Multiple Listing Services of Ventura/Oxnard/Ojai/Los Angeles/Santa Barbara, the National Association of Realtors and a Director of the California Association of Realtors 2018-22.  In addition to her professional affiliations, she is involved with non-profit organizations as a consultant and volunteer, contributing time and financial support; those include the Charitable Foundation of Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices California Properties, The Unity Shoppe, Heal the Ocean, The Heartfelt Foundation, Santa Barbara Food Bank, CASA and Transition House.

description:
Real estate is more than a profession for me – it’s a calling and a privilege. I see every transaction as an opportunity to support individuals and families through one of life’s most meaningful transitions. Whether you’re buying your first home, selling your current one, or investing in your future, I’m here to guide you with integrity, compassion, and an unwavering commitment to your goals. I take pride in being your steady hand from start to finish—and long after the deal is done.
 
Since stepping into the real estate industry, I’ve quickly become a top office achiever, driven by a passion for service and a relentless pursuit of excellence. My clients appreciate my personalized approach, deep market knowledge, and commitment to results. While you may start your journey as a client, you’ll finish as part of my extended real estate family.

I led both U.S. and international teams, heading Quality Assurance, Compliance, and Sustainability initiatives. This experience sharpened my attention to detail, refined my sense of home design, and gave me a unique ability to evaluate properties with a discerning eye—an advantage I now pass on to every buyer and seller I represent.
