title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
The Schlifkin Team has more than 36 years of combined real estate experience.  Their vast knowledge and experience with the market, trends, transactions, neighborhoods and marketing places them among the nation's elite real estate professionals.  They are consistently ranked among the top agents in the nation and have helped thousands of families buy and/or sell a home. 

The Schlifkin Team has founded their business on the commitment that their clients deserve the highest level of personal service and attention.  Much of their success can be attributed to total customer satisfaction resulting in referrals and repeat clients year after year.

Sheila has been in real estate for 29 years and is consistently one of the top producers in the country.  She is included in Who's Who in Real Estate and is proud to be one of Kentwood's top agents.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Soley Maria of Kentwood Real Estate Cherry Creek has been in the luxury real estate market since 2013. With unparalleled integrity, loyalty to her clients, and mastery of her craft, Soley is the ideal choice whether you’re looking to buy or sell. Her 15+ year background in sales, marketing, and customer service with world-renowned brands, including Toyota, Yamaha, and Chipotle, bring an elevated level of professionalism to each transaction, and her warm personality makes those transactions absolutely effortless.

Born in Iceland, Soley moved to Colorado to attend the University of Colorado at Boulder where she earned degrees in Economics and Finance. Over a decade later, she’s still here enjoying the mountains and endless sunshine with her two Labrador Retrievers. Soley enjoys spending time with friends and family, and involving herself in everything this city has to offer, and in 2017, she participated in the Next Generation Committee for the Biennial of the Americas.  In her free time, you can find her running in Wash Park, snowboarding, playing tennis, practicing yoga, trying new restaurants, and enjoying Denver’s art and music scene.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Solveig Tschudi Lawrence worked with Howard Ecker + Company as the Managing Director for the Denver office from 2008 to 2017. Prior to that she worked in New York in sports and entertainment marketing for IMG. Solveig specializes in representing corporate tenants in commercial office, retail and flex lease and owner-occupied purchase transactions. She believes that space should be strongly aligned with the culture, people, and business goals of an organization, and therefore dives deeply into the relationship to truly understand her clients’ needs.

Solveig graduated from the University of Denver with a Bachelor of Science in business administration with a focus on international business and marketing.

She is married with three children and loves spending time skiing, golfing, playing tennis and being outdoors as well as traveling back to her native country of Norway.
title: Senior Commercial Advisor

description:
As a Colorado native, Staci believes that whether you are single or raising a family, Colorado is the best place to live and build your life. Staci grew up in Green Mountain and then attended Colorado State University where she met and married fellow CSU Ram, Mike Burns (also a Colorado Native). Staci and Mike have 2 beautiful daughters, and 3 incredibly loving retrievers (1 Golden, and 2 English Cream). Staci and her husband enjoy golfing together, watching the girls play soccer, learning  to ride horses, and spending as much time traveling together as possible. 

Staci has been in the real estate industry since 2001. She had held various positions in title insurance, from closings to sales. She was part of the development of SharperAgent, an internet-based real estate marketing and customer-relationship-management platform, where she advanced to working nationally within both the real estate and mortgage industries. Staci’s unique background of business planning, marketing, title and real estate gives her a distinct advantage in helping her clients.

Staci’s passion for real estate, her high energy, industry knowledge and un-containable desire to truly “help people” is what drives Staci’s clients back to work with her time and time again.

Let Staci’s fun-loving spirit help you truly enjoy the experience and assist you in all of your real estate needs.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Stacy Neir is one of Denver's premier real estate agents. Her mission statement is to "Make every Client a Client for Life." With this approach to every transaction, she strives to exceed her client’s expectations which is why 90% of her sales are repeat and referral clients. 

Throughout her distinguished 17 year career in the residential real estate business she has garnered numerous sales production awards which places her among the upper echelon of real estate teams in Colorado and nationwide. 

#1 team at Kentwood City Properties for sales production in 2017 selling $35,000,000 in real estate!
Denver Metro Realtor Association Roundtable of Excellence award every year since 2003
5280 Magazine 5 Star Real Estate Agent award recipient every year since 2010
Kentwood $10,000,000 club since 2013
2015 Platinum Award Winner with DMAR with over $23,000,000 in sales
Sold over $165,000,000 in real estate since 2001
This is a huge honor for her and her team as she strives to exceed her client's expectations and make the real estate process a fun and memorable experience.

She also believes in giving back to the community in which she lives. Stacy founded Women Who Wine and Who Are Charitable which is a women's group who meet monthly to supply goods and supplies to numerous local charities while enjoying a glass a wine. She has raised money for Cancer League of Colorado and participated in Over The Edge which raises money for cancer patients in Colorado. She has also sponsored several families through Be The Gift.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Stef Erion, Broker Associate, provides knowledge, experience, and dedication in assisting clients achieve their real estate dreams. She works persistently and efficiently to assure positive outcomes and smooth transactions for her clients when buying or selling any type of home or property. Her specialties include rightsizing, upsizing, first-time home, vacation homes, luxury and commercial properties. Her quality of service is defined through integrity paired with understanding client needs and expectations to accomplish successful transactions from the beginning, through closing, and far beyond.  Stef strives to build lasting relationships and proves this through satisfied repeat clients. Stef puts her clients’ best interest at heart because she understands that to a client, it is much more than a piece of property for sale.

Membership Certifications:

·         CLHMS Certified Luxury Home Marketing Specialist

·         CNE Certified Negotiation Expert

·         Member of Loveland/Berthoud Association of Realtors

·         Member of Colorado Association of Realtors

·         Member of National Association of Realtors
title: Realtor®, CLHMS, CNE

description:
Stephanie Lepard is an award-winning Denver real estate agent known for unmatched service, deep market expertise, and a warm, client-first approach. She understands Denver’s diverse neighborhoods inside and out and draws on her background in marketing, project management, and sales to guide clients seamlessly through the buying and selling process.

Raised in the northern suburbs of Chicago in a real estate family, Stephanie takes after her mother, also a realtor, and enjoys collaborating with her when possible. After earning her degree from Wittenberg University and spending 11 years in the insurance industry, she transitioned her skills into real estate, where she has built a reputation for professionalism, dedication, and trusted results.

Stephanie has called Denver home for more than 20 years and currently lives in Hilltop with her husband, son, and their golden retriever. With her daughter now a proud University of Michigan Wolverine, she is also excited to spend more time exploring Ann Arbor. Outside of real estate, Stephanie enjoys discovering Denver’s award-winning dining scene as well as skiing, tennis, golf, and most recently learning mahjong. 

In addition to her real estate career, Stephanie has been a longtime supporter of the Children’s Hospital of Colorado, where she has served on the Development Committee and the NICU Family Advisory Council, and continues to participate in fundraising efforts and community initiatives close to her heart.

Her expertise, dedication, and genuine care for her clients ensure a seamless experience, whether you’re buying your first home, upgrading, or selling your Denver dream property.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
With over a decade of experience in the real estate industry, Stephanie Sulstrom stands out as a seasoned and devoted agent dedicated to serving the thriving Denver community. Her unwavering passion for people, real estate, and interior design imbues her work with a truly unique blend of expertise and dedication. Stephanie’s deep local market knowledge and her unwavering commitment to client happiness make her a valuable asset for both buyers and sellers.

Twelve years ago, Stephanie and her husband relocated to Colorado, and fell in love with this beautiful state. They decided to plant roots, raise her family in this incredible state, and share her appreciation for the local community.

Stephanie's academic foundation includes a degree in business with a minor in marketing, providing a solid base for her real estate success. Her professional journey began as a sales manager overseeing the entire west coast territory for a dessert company, where she discovered her love for connecting with people. This skill seamlessly transitioned into her role in real estate, where she has excelled over time. Stephanie has achieved the status of a top-producing agent in the vibrant Denver area, ascending to a leadership role where she had the privilege of mentoring newer agents in the industry, generously sharing her passion and expertise.

When Stephanie isn't assisting her clients, you'll often find her enjoying moments with her husband and two children. They love traveling, camping, boating, skiing, and cheering for their favorite sports teams as a family. Additionally, one of Stephanie's greatest joys is watching her children excel in sports and activities. Stephanie is also passionate about interior design, staging, and decorating. She loves assisting both friends and clients with creative home decor concepts and ideas.

Stephanie's unwavering commitment to her clients shines through in each and every transaction. She consistently goes the extra mile to ensure that buying or selling a home is an exceptional experience. Clients value her integrity, enthusiasm, and remarkable efficiency. Stephanie possesses a wealth of experience, spanning a diverse range of clients, from first-time homebuyers to seasoned investors and sellers. Her talent lies in uncovering hidden opportunities within the market and skillfully negotiating deals that consistently surpass expectations. She holds deep gratitude for every client she has had the privilege of serving and the opportunity to help them discover their perfect new place to call home.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description: Steven Kruse is a valued Broker Associate with Kentwood Real Estate . He knows residential communities from Golden to Reunion like the back of his hand but he has worked in most communities in the northern section of the Denver metro area and suburbs. Steven has been entrenched in real estate all of his life.  Growing up as the son of a custom home builder, he witnessed in his father hard-work exemplified.  Due to that background, Steven truly understands the evolution of a home, all the way from acquiring the land to the passing of the home to its new owners. He has used those skills to help new home buyers evaluate and purchase brand new homes from builders. Most recently, the sold the new homes at Solterra for Infinity Home Collection. Steven loves helping Denver relocation buyers find the right neighborhoods for them.  Originally licensed in 1996 in the state of Georgia, Steven began his sales career by helping friends and family on their home search, while he simultaneously studied to earn his Bachelor's Degree in Real Estate from the University of Georgia.  In 2001, Steven took his passion for real estate to Colorado, so he could also enjoy his other interests of hiking, biking and snowboarding.  While in Colorado, he has felt honored with the opportunity to be a part of some of the finest new home communities in Denver and its surrounding areas.  Steven has been a LEED A.P. since 2009 and has a deep understanding of "green" building.  He has generated over $100 million in sales revenue and received multiple awards for both customer satisfaction and referral lead generation.  Steven met his beautiful wife in 2003, and they were married in 2005.  Today, they enjoy living in Arapahoe County with their two boys, born in 2008 and 2011.  Steven and his wife are active members of the Cherry Creek School District and supporters of the Boys and Girls Club of Metro Denver.  In his spare time, Steven enjoys his hobbies of snowboarding and golf; traveling with his family; and volunteering with his sons' activities.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
SUCCESS

Steve Travers began his dynamic real estate career with RE/MAX and within one year had soared to the top of his profession.  In his first full year, Steve was honored with the RE/MAX top award, “The 100% Club” for being among the top 1% of all real estate agents in the country, an honor he has achieved every year since.  Steve continues to refine and enhance his successful approach to real estate and consistently rates as a top producer in the Rocky Mountain region.

Dedication, enthusiasm, knowledge and innovation are only a few of the traits that Steve possesses.  The incredible energy that he expends on behalf of his buyers and sellers, combined with his wide experience in real estate, is the reason for Steve’s constant success in real estate.

A BUYER’S BEST FRIEND

Steve stresses the importance of “neighborhood” to buyers.  The schools, parks, shopping, churches, recreation, activities, rather than simply a house.  “I feel that helping buyers find the right neighborhood that meets their needs is more challenging than helping them find the right home,” he says.

SERVICE FOR SELLERS

His desire to do the best possible job for his clients is sincere, giving every listing and sale his utmost on behalf of his clients in an effort to make the transaction work to their benefit.  With his car phone, portable phone and listed home phone number, he is always available to answer any questions and check out leads.for sellers, Steve believes that people want, “action” from their real estate agent, and that’s just what they get from him.  Steve is a master of service and follow-up, and keeping his clients constantly informed.  If you’re looking for a real estate professional that stands head and shoulders above the crowd, look no further than Steve Travers.

TOTAL INVOLVEMENT

Whenever Steve becomes involved in anything, he gives it his all.  Witness his service on various neighborhood and community associations ~ the time he spends helping with the Canterbury Homeowners Association where he lives ~his leadership on the Summerfest Festival, and in the Partner in Education Fund~ the long hours he spends coaching his daughter’s soccer team~ and the time he devotes to his wife and three children.  Steve is definitely a go-getter, the kind of tireless, enthusiastic worker you wanton your side whether you’re buying or selling a home.  Steve prides himself on building long term relationships with his clients.  He gets to know them as people, because he really cares about them.  To what does he attribute his outstanding success? “To the positive attitude I have about living in this area,” he says.  “ I share a common belief that this one of the best residential areas in Metro Denver to live and raise a family, and I use my position as a Real Estate Professional to promote and advertise the many advantages of living in this area.”

ASK YOUR NEIGHBOR ABOUT STEVE TRAVERS!

“We found a home that we wanted to buy but had to sell ours in 24 hours or lose out on our dream home.  Steve Travers worked around the clock to find us a buyer!”

“Steve always kept us informed.”

“I would definitely use him again!”

AN AGENT OTHER AGENTS LIKE TO WORK WITH!

“I always feel like it’s a win/win situation when I am dealing with Steve.”

“I really enjoy working with Steve.  He is continuously coming up with good solutions for difficult problems.”

“It was a pleasure working with such a devoted and conscientious professional.  I look forward  to my next transaction with Steve."
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®, CRS

description:
"Good brokers know how to close. Great brokers know that's only the beginning."  

Stock is a top-producing broker and has been selling real estate for forty years.

He markets single-family homes as well as residential income properties. Stock services listings situated throughout the major metropolitan Denver and surrounding areas.

Stock is highly skilled at finding properties for buyers. At any point in time, his clients will include single people and couples searching for their first home, homeowners who want to move up to a larger home, and executives who need extensive entertainment facilities. His innovative marketing talents give high exposure to properties for sale. This attracts more buyers and leads to a quick and smooth closing.

Stock Jonekos' skill in addressing the needs of both buyers and sellers prompted his previous company to name him Education Director. In that capacity Stock instructed other real estate agents in the business practices and ethical standards required of successful agents. He has also held the position of Broker Manager.

Prior to starting his real estate career, Stock was associated with The Gage Group of Los Angeles, a theatrical talent agency with offices also located in New York. His position with this company required personal interaction with clients to develop or maintain their standing in the theatrical, television, and movie industry.

Stock majored in Business Administration at Sacramento State University and California State University Northridge. Growing up Stock traveled the world extensively with his family and he continues to enjoy experiencing new people and countries whenever time allows.

Stock Jonekos' community service, education and professional background have provided him with the opportunity to develop his natural communication skills. His personal philosophy about the real estate business emphasizes communication.

'I think that the essence of a smooth transaction is a series of conversations,' Stock explained. 'My role is to ensure that all parties understand each other and to keep the lines of communi-cation open throughout the transaction. It's a responsibility and also one of the really satisfying aspects of real estate for me.'
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Over 25 years of committed real estate experience in the Denver Metro area.  Areas of listing and buying experience include Denver metro areas from the western and northern suburbs to Highlands, Central Denver, Bonnie Brae, Washington Park, Platt Park, Country Club, Congress Park, Park Hill, Cherry Creek, Cherry Hills, Greenwood Village, Englewood, Highlands Ranch, Centennial, Englewood, Littleton and the south and eastern suburban areas.  

I have been a consistent member of the Million Dollar Round Table with the Denver Board of Realtors and I am among the top producers with Kentwood Real Estate.  I have renovated two personal residences and own rental property, one of them I hold in my IRA.  I have a very hands on, personal approach – making your goals, my goals.  I am friendly, patient, and outgoing.

My clients call me “one of a kind” in the business and compliment my strength of character and integrity. I have a proven ability and history of winning bidding wars, negotiating and winning favorable results for buyers and sellers in this competitive market. I have built my business on a solid foundation of referrals from my database of hundreds of satisfied customers.  I look forward to hearing from you.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®, SRES

description:
I moved to Colorado from Goshen, Indiana over 30 years ago and now live in Greeley, Colorado with my fabulous husband Orest Dubynsky and my two fur babies Mr. Quigley and Fergus. They are West Highland Terriers.  In Indiana, I became a Registered Nurse and then received my degree in Business Management in Colorado. 

After working in nursing administration for many years, first with RVNA as Program Director in Greeley then as Director of Home Care and Hospice at Estes Park Medical Center, I opened a retail business in Estes. For 24 years, this shop featured supplies and inspiration for knitting, needlework and quilting projects.

 My love for Real Estate began in Indiana where I worked as a Realtor with Century 21.  When I moved to Colorado, I got my Real Estate License in 2019.  Before 2019, I indulged in one of my favorite things to do.  Buying properties to fix up, resell or rent. 

Living in Colorado feeds into my passion for the outdoors, wildlife and enjoying the world around me. Knitting is my other true love which doesn’t fit my type A personality, but it is truly my Jam!! I volunteer with NoCo Humane Society in Evans and Habitat for Humanity. I am a member of the National Association of Realtors and Greeley Area Board of Realtors. I have received the designation of Accredited Buyer’s Representative (ABR) and have complete the course for Certified Real Estate Negotiator

Susan would love to connect with you to learn more about you, your real estate dreams and talk about living the Colorado lifestyle.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Selecting Real Estate as a profession involves more than helping clients buy or sell property.  For most people, the purchase or sale of a home, vacation property, or as part of an investment portfolio, is among the biggest financial transactions they will ever experience.  I believe the best realtor is one who can learn the needs and desires of their clients and work diligently to ensure that the client obtains the best possible outcome while minimizing stress and uncertainty for all concerned.

When it’s time to buy or sell, you can rely upon me to provide timely, accurate, and transparent communication and solution-oriented negotiations. I’ll provide you with personalized service and support from start to finish.

I became a realtor because I have a passion for helping people. If you’re shopping for a home, we’ll tour several homes and explore appropriate neighborhoods. I’ll provide my industry knowledge and insight and patiently help you find the perfect fit for your family and your financial goals.

If you are selling your home, we will work through the preparation and emotions together to ensure that you receive top dollar for your house. My focus is to meet your specific needs, and I’ll never ask you to compromise on what matters most to you. I will expertly navigate the process and continuously represent your best interests. You will always be aware of what’s happening, and you will know what to expect next.

In addition to real estate, I enjoy being on the lake, traveling and spending quality time with my husband and children. I live in the same neighborhood where I grew up, which offers a strong sense of community, wonderful quality of life, and easy access to nature.

Whether you’re a first-time buyer, third-time seller, or seasoned investor, I would be thrilled to meet you and put my real estate knowledge and experience to work for you. Lakefront or mountain property? I’m your agent. Ready to get started? Give me a call if you’re looking for an agent who will be responsive and guide you through each step. I am patient yet persistent, and I strive to meet or exceed your greatest expectations.
title: Realtor®, CME, CREN, RENE

description:

Industry expert and featured in media outlets such as 9News, Inman News, Denver Business Journal, and 5280 Magazine. I have lived in Colorado since 1978, I have been happily married since 1999, I have a beautiful daughter who was born in 2011, and one mini French Bulldog.

Brigette is a true champion for her clients, watching out for you every step of the way, and knows the market like the back of her hands. description:
Thomas & Rosanne Dutzer combine a versatile mix of business backgrounds to form a dynamic team capable of servicing a wide array of clients.

After a 10-year stint in the Title Insurance industry that culminated with the position of Sr Vice President for a national Title & Escrow operation, Thomas joined Coldwell Banker to serve as Administrative Manager for one of the Front Range’s premier offices and later awarded the prestigious 2011 Denver Metro Association of Realtors Support Person of the Year. During this time, he obtained an MBA in Finance and International Business from Regis University while also co-founding the Regis Networking Group, an organization designed to provide connections for adult learners from Regis University and the surrounding community.

In March 2021, Thomas assumed the role of Managing Broker for Kentwood City Properties. With oversight of 40+ agents, he is privileged to work for some of Denver’s top producers. The office features a specialization on the LoDo housing market and is known for its vast experience selling some of Denver’s largest condominium projects such as The LakeHouse and McGregor Square. In 2021, the office was awarded the prestigious DMAR Excellence Award for offices between 31-50 agents in the categories of Sales Production and Total Transactions.

Rosanne’s eclectic experience has also served as a valuable foundation for success. Having worked in residential and commercial property management, she has vast industry experience. Additionally, she has worked for The Integer Group, a global full-service advertising agency and Street Source Marketing & Communications.

Since transitioning into real estate full-time, Rosanne has deftly utilized her marketing background and social media skills to promote our brand. These skill sets are the perfect complement to her contagious energy and ability to accurately identify client needs. Her impact extends into the community as Vice Chair of the Asian Chamber of Commerce and as a member of Kentwood's Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Council.

As a dynamic partnership, they exemplify full-service care for their clients. Remarkable communication, ongoing market analysis, oversight of inspection and appraisal, and coordination of contractors are just a part of their concierge-level customer service. In their first full year (2016) as a selling team, Thomas and Rosanne were among the highest ranked small teams at Coldwell Banker. Since transferring to Kentwood City Properties in December 2017, they have been a steadying presence at one of Denver’s most iconic real estate offices.

To make a positive impact in the community, Thomas and Rosanne are members of WeRide4 – a local non-profit cycling club that supports various endeavors that support cycling around the country. Both enjoy cycling outdoors on the fantastic bike routes north of Denver. If you see them on the road, be sure to say Hi!!

description:
Thomas & Rosanne combine a unique set of backgrounds and skills to form a dynamic team capable of servicing a wide array of clients.

Shortly after relocating to Colorado in 1997, Thomas began a 10-year career in the title and escrow industry. This culminated with a position as Sr. Vice President of National Operations for a nationally-licensed firm. The experience provided a fascinating perspective on the specific manner in which real estate transactions come to fruition across the country.

In 2009 he joined Coldwell Banker to serve as Administrative Manager for one of the Front Range’s premier offices. His work was rewarded with receipt of the prestigious 2011 Denver Metro Association of Realtors Support Person of the Year.

During this time, he also co-founded the Regis Networking Group, a networking organization designed to provide direction to adult learners from Regis University and the surrounding community. It has since developed into the Denver Leader’s Network.

Rosanne’s eclectic experience has also served as a valuable foundation for success. Having worked in residential and commercial property management, she has vast industry experience. Further, she went on to work for The Integer Group, a global full-service advertising agency and Street Source Marketing & Communications.

Since transitioning into real estate full-time, Rosanne has deftly utilized her marketing background and social media skills to promote our brand. These skill sets are the perfect complement to her contagious energy and ability to accurately identify the needs of new clients.

As a dynamic partnership, they exemplify full-service care for their clients. Remarkable communication, ongoing market analysis, oversight of inspection and appraisal, and coordination of contractors are just a part of their concierge-level customer service. In their first full year as a selling team, Thomas and Rosanne recorded the 3rd highest sales volume for small teams at their previous Brokerage's Denver office.

To make a positive impact in the community, Thomas and Rosanne are members of Wish for Wheels – a local non-profit that gives new bicycles and helmets to children in low-income communities. They contribute a portion of proceeds regularly to this wonderful initiative. When not at work, find Thomas at the Denver Athletic Club where he competes as an A-level racquetball player. Rosanne prefers Spin class at the local rec center. Both enjoy cycling outdoors on the fantastic bike routes north of Denver. If you see them on the road, be sure to say Hi!

description: Hello! My name is Tiffany Glucksman and I have grown up and spent most of my life in the Denver metro area. After graduating from Cherry Creek High School, I received a bachelor’s degree from the University of Colorado at Denver, majoring in political science and minoring in psychology. Shortly thereafter, I received my Masters in Public Administration from the School of Public Affairs, once again, at the University of Colorado at Denver. As you can begin to see, I love Colorado and more specifically, I love Denver. This City has so much to offer and I am thrilled to be able to help you make a move to or within the area. Are you a first-time home buyer? Hoping to upgrade? Looking to relocate? No matter what your current needs are, I am the realtor who can make your real estate dreams become a reality.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description: Real estate is Tim Colleran's chosen profession. In 1978, immediately after attending the University of Colorado with studies in Finance and Real Estate, Tim entered the real estate business. During his thirty year career, close personal attention to his clients has been a key to his success. With career sales in excess of $600-million, Tim's experience level is high. Because of this substantial foundation, the information and counseling he offers his clients is reliable and beneficial. The decisions his clients must make in buying and selling a home are made more confidently when they have been given the correct facts about the current real estate market and how to proceed in it. Tim's valuable knowledge is continually updated through his energetic activities in listing and selling properties. Tim is comfortable working in every price range. His proven marketing plan gets homes sold for top dollar and his complete knowledge of the market gives him an uncanny ability to match his buyers' wishes with the most exceptional properties.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Denver-area Realtor Todd Landgrave is a long-time Colorado resident who has lived in Highlands Ranch since 1992. Real estate runs deep in his family with other members working as appraisers and mortgage lenders. Todd himself worked for a number of years as a licensed appraiser before becoming a real estate broker.

Todd earned a Bachelor’s of Science degree in Business Management-Finance with honors from Brigham Young University. He also earned a Masters of Business Administration-Finance from California State University at Fullerton. He is an active member of the National Association of Realtors, Colorado Association of Realtors, and the Denver Board of Realtors.

Todd brings a wide breadth of experience to his Kentwood clients having worked in corporate finance for decades in the defense and snack foods industries. He also worked most recently with the world’s largest commercial real estate firm on various accounts with health care industry clients. This background, along with his appraisal experience, allows him to provide clients with superior, in-depth service.

Todd is deeply involved in his community. He was twice elected president of the Highlands Ranch Community Association, has served on the Board of Directors of the Aurora Chamber of Commerce, and as a member of the Ronald McDonald Charities granting committee.

Todd married his college sweetheart Kathy and they have four beautiful daughters: Candice, Lindsey, Carly, and Mackenzie. Kathy is a 3rd grade teacher in the Douglas County School district. When not helping his clients, Todd enjoys biking, backpacking with his family, and exploring Colorado on his Harley Davidson motorcycle.
title: Broker Associate, SRES, RENE

description:
With a commercial real estate career spanning over 22 years, Todd Snyder has established himself as a prominent figure in Denver’s commercial real estate industry, serving the interests of owners, developers, and tenants alike. His expertise covers a wide spectrum of real estate services, including investment and user sales, leasing, consulting, development, and appraisal work across diverse real estate asset classes.

With a passion for cities, Todd finds great fulfillment in not only helping his clients achieve their real estate objectives but also in contributing to the vibrant and distinctive culture of Denver. His dedication to the city's growth and development is a driving force behind his work.

As an investor and owner of commercial real estate properties himself, Todd possesses a keen understanding of the challenges and opportunities his clients navigate every day. He leverages this invaluable insight to assist his clients in making informed and intelligent real estate decisions, ensuring their investments align seamlessly with their strategic goals.

Todd’s brokerage business is focused on office, retail, industrial and land development properties within Denver’s urban core neighborhoods priced between $1 - $25 million. Throughout his career, Todd has been involved in over 350 transactions valued at over $650 million.

Todd lives in the Observatory Park neighborhood of Denver with his wife, two children, and two dogs. He enjoys live music, navigating the city on his bike, skiing, playing tennis and pickleball.

Professional Affiliations

University of Colorado – Professional Mentorship Program

Denver Metro Commercial Association of Realtors
Levitt Pavilion Denver – Board Member

Education

Bachelor of Science degree in Finance from the University of Colorado, Boulder, CO
title: Senior Commercial Advisor

description:
TOM GROSS - Tom Gross Team at Kentwood Real Estate

Denver area Realtor Tom Gross has a long list of highly satisfied clients. He is known for his extensive depth of knowledge and expertise regarding the real estate process based on more than 30 years of experience. Tom has built his business on frequent communication, accessibility, attention to detail, client advocacy, patience, and gratitude.

Tom’s success as a Realtor has earned him numerous awards including 5280 Magazine’s Top Producer Agent Award, NEXT DOOR Neighborhood Favorite,  Top 1% Five Star Professional Award Winner for 12 consecutive years,  DMAR’s Platinum & Titanium Awards, and Kentwood Real Estate, DTC Top 10 Team since 2014.

Tom’s reputation has created relationships within the real estate community that lead to cooperation and smooth transactions with other Realtors. They respect and trust his professionalism and know he will work diligently to overcome obstacles. 

Tom started his real estate career working with his father in Perkasie, PA just outside Philadelphia. While in Perkasie he met and married Lori Gerrick Gross. They moved to Denver in 1998 and settled into the Cherry Creek School District to raise their 2 children. This was not the first move to Colorado for Tom. He spent his early 20’s in Steamboat enjoying skiing and mountain biking.

Tom is an active member of the Centennial Rotary, he was named Rotarian of the Year for 2 years in a row and served as President for the 2022 - 2023 term. He also serves on the Audit Committee for the City of Centennial and is on the  Long Range Facilities Planning Committee for Cherry Creek School District. In his spare time, he enjoys riding his mountain bike around Cherry Creek Reservoir, hiking, and is an avid Broncos fan.

“I am available any time to schedule a no-pressure interview to answer any questions you may have.  I will provide you with a simple and accurate answer so you can make better decisions regarding your real estate needs. 

You can reach me directly at 303-591-2116. 

I look forward to having the opportunity to speak to you.

Tom Gross
title: Broker Associate, CRS, ABR, SRES

description:
Val Miller, originally from Atlanta, GA relocated to the picturesque landscapes of Northern Colorado in 2001 with her high school sweetheart. Over the years, Val's journey has been a dynamic blend of diverse experiences in customer service across various industries, including healthcare and the thriving craft beer community, which brings a unique perspective to her career in real estate.

She treasures the region for its unique charm and endless opportunities. With a loving husband, two amazing daughters, and a household teeming with pets, Val enjoys the vibrant tapestry of family life.

In her free time, Val indulges her passion for supporting local businesses, enjoys the excitement of college football, and can often be found at live music events.

Val's commitment extends beyond her family life. She finds fulfillment in giving back to the community that has given her so much via local non-profits, schools, and her church. Val's guiding mission is to support others in their life-changing decisions, helping them recognize their full potential and embrace life to the fullest.

Her experiences have equipped her with invaluable skills in communication, problem-solving, and a deep understanding of what it means to truly serve others.

When you choose Val Miller as your real estate professional, you not only gain a committed and

experienced partner but also a friend who genuinely cares about your well-being and success.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
A Third Generation Colorado native, Virginia has accumulated an extensive and diversified background in the Denver real estate industry . Not only has she successfully represented buyers and sellers in Denver’s many and ever changing market conditions, she also cofounded a successful luxury real estate development company , Montage Development in 2003 . She continues to develop new luxury single family homes, founding VR Development in 2017. 

Whether representing a client in purchasing or selling a home, or creating her next vision for a spec home, Virginia prides herself on being a highly effective communicator and multitasker.

“ Integrity and diligence are the most important values in any transaction”  

Virginia resides in Denver with her husband ,two sons, and their beloved Golden Retrievers. Avid supporters of Denver’s community , favorite past and present charities are Denver Dumb Friends League, Children’s Hospital, The Denver Art Museum, Ace Scholarships, The Wild Animal Sanctuary, and the CU Johnson Depression Center. 

In her off time, Virginia is passionate about spending time with her family and friends, fitness, travel, and being around positive people!
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
"WENDY KNOWS THE COMMUNITY!" Being a Denver native, Wendy is familiar with the diversity and character of the neighborhoods throughout metro Denver and the surrounding areas. She has an insiders perspective to what is considered a value for your money and enjoys acquainting people with this community and areas. This expertise, along with her passion and eagerness to PLEASE HER CLIENTS, has awarded her many friendships and loyal clients.

Wendy also brings her background of design and marketing talent to her SELLERS and to position their property for the BEST PRICE in a competitive market place. Wendy believes in "SHOWCASING" your home's features and working to create a "WOW" factor when a potential buyer walks through the door. Wendy markets through various web sites, target print media, other brokers and agent open houses, along with brochures and the Metrolist computer program.

Wendy is a great listener and educates her BUYERS about neighborhoods, property values and then she seeks out the BEST PROPERTIES that fit their LIFESTYLE and BUDGET. She then negotiates the BEST PRICE. There have been several occasions when Wendy has sold the first house she shows her buyer.

Wendy graduated from Colorado State University with a BA in graphic design. After working in the design industry for 10 years, she returned to school and received her teaching certificate from the University of Colorado, Denver. She taught for 9 years in the Cherry Creek School District until she had children of her own. She is married to Bruce Glazer, who is Kroenke Sports Enterprises Vice President and CFO. They have 2 children, Shayna and David along with 2 dogs, a golden retriever, Mulligan and a little rescued mutt, Grayson. 

Wendy is very involved in the community and is on many boards of directors and committees. Some are the Anti-Defamation League, Cherry Creek Chamber of Commerce, Denver Board of Realtors, Melanoma Research Cancer Foundation and Welcome to Colorado International Club.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Wendy specializes in buying and selling real estate in the Denver and surrounding areas. Offers an unparalleled level of market knowledge, expertise, service and integrity. A client-first philosophy. As a 30+ year resident of the Denver/Cherry Hills Village area she is a great source for school, community and neighborhood information. She is a third generation realtor and has a successful background in buying, selling, managing, and renovatiing residential and investment properties.

Wendy studied to be a chef at Kendall College in Evanston, IL, and Le Cordon Bleu, Paris, France. She specializes in cooking for people who suffer from severe food allergies.

She actively supports: The Food Allergy Research and Education Foundation, Denver Art Museum, First Tee, Denver Dumb Friends League, Alzheimer's Foundation and the Sons and Daughters of WWII Veterans.
title: Broker Associate, Realtor®

description:
Zack Jenkins is a seasoned broker with over seven years of dedicated commercial real estate experience, specializing in tenant representation and investment sales, with a particular expertise in the multifamily sector.

Throughout his career, Zack has demonstrated a keen ability to navigate the complexities of multifamily real estate transactions, making him a trusted advisor for clients looking to invest in or manage multifamily properties.

Zack’s commitment to his clients’ success is unwavering, and he strives to be a valuable resource by maintaining a deep understanding of Denver’s ever-evolving real estate markets. His extensive experience in the multifamily sector has equipped him with the knowledge to identify and maximize investment opportunities, ensuring that his clients achieve their financial and strategic objectives. His personal approach ensures that his clients’ goals are met through detailed preparation and active execution of the agreed-upon strategy, with a focus on lease/contract administration and project management. Zack’s multifamily experience extends to market analysis, property valuation, and navigating the nuances of multifamily financing, making him a well-rounded professional in the field.

Before joining Kentwood Commercial, Zack honed his skills as a commercial broker at Calibrate Real Estate and CBRE. During his tenure at these firms, he exhibited particular proficiency in the multifamily, office, and industrial sectors, building a reputation as a reliable and results-driven agent. His work in the multifamily sector involved managing large portfolios, negotiating complex deals, and fostering strong relationships with investors and property managers alike.

Originally hailing from Atlanta, Zack is a proud University of Colorado graduate who passionately embraces the Colorado lifestyle. When he’s not closing deals, you can find him hitting the ski slopes with enthusiasm during the winter months or indulging in the pleasures of fly fishing and golf during the warmer seasons.
title: Commercial Advisor
